contest-event.event-date:
April 29, 1967 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Scheherazade Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:05 p.m. Aug. 28, 2015, 1:58 p.m. 1 Cowpen and Crofton Workmen's Band John Carr 2 Mirrlees Works Band Norman Ashcroft 3 Rockingham Band Edmund Hoole 4 Greenway Selectus Band Edward Gray 7 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Alfie Burch 7 55th Old Boys Association Silver Band Jack Burch Unknown Result Cinderford Band Cecil Chappell Unknown Result Yorkshire Evening Post Band Peter Kitson Unknown Result Walkden Band E.
